title: veruvanEla
sahitya:
varuvanEla O manasA vEmARu nE delpalEdA


anupallavi

  mari marinE nEmO enci mATi mATiki iTula nIvu


caraNam    parama dukkha karamula I bhava pAshamulOna tagiliveraccunu sharaNa manina narulamutO brOcina
sthiramugAnu nammina shrI bhOgi shayanuDaina varada venkatEshvaruDu nirvahincedani telisiyuNDaga
